text:
This was my first electric guitar, which I got in Chile at 14. 

Attempting to repaint it, I botched the job, and ever since, I've carried its pieces with me. 

Now, at 27 and living in NYC, it's time to rebuild it with custom electronics.

 cc: @_buildspace @_nightsweekends @FarzaTV
